favourite.article: Praise the Lord I've been found again!
I'm back in my Father's house again.
Were so happy here! Come and rejoice with us!
Oh Lord Jesus, thank You for becoming life to us. We love You Lord Jesus...
Dear God, thank You for coming out looking for me.
Great
This is real.
Love this! It's so joyful! Kind of got a bit of jazz thing going in the tune too. Definately going to learn to play it and try do it at church.
Singing and hearing praises to my loving Saviour is more than a joy to me. Amen and Praise to His mighty name.
Praise the Lord!

Praise the Lord for His great mercy and love to us. Before we believed and repented of all our sins, we were dead and was lost. But hallelujah! We are now back in our Father's house, the church. May we all learn how to conduct ourselves in our Father's House..for the building up. Amen. Hallelujah..
Made me realize how much I love churching! 10/10
Praise the Lord we are back where we belong! Back in the Father's house again!

The Bible says Luke 15 : 18 My son was dead and alive again, he was lost and is found. It was the story of the boy who leave his father. Praise the Lord He's a good Father. He saves us from sin, He lives and died in the cross and resurrected, He will get inside to live in our spirit. Thank You Lord that I'm a believer since I was a baby child to nine years old.
I was lost, now I'm found again! I was dead, but now I live! Praise the Lord we have a wonderful Father!
I hoped they notated the phrases inside the parenthesis. Amen
Praise the Lord that I was dead but now I live!!! AMEN!!

I was in a far away land, I left the Father's house to eat with swines! Jesus woke me up and I'm back on my way to the Father's house.
The Good Shepherd leaves the 99 safely in the sheep fold to find that one lost sheep entangled in the brambles that's crying out from the heart. Thank You Jesus! Who can measure Your mercy, if we just cry out and repent of our backsliding!
HALLELUJAH! We love being in our Father's House! All the dear brothers and sister warmly loving each other and growing in the divine life of our Father! We love You Father!
PTL that God is with us, our Father and our all in all. Amen.
